abstract: Health care giant Johnson & Johnson has filed a lawsuit against the American Red Cross over rights to use the iconic symbol they have both shared for more than 100 years.
snippet: Health care giant Johnson & Johnson has filed a lawsuit against the American Red Cross over rights to use the iconic symbol they have both shared for more than 100 years.
lead_paragraph: The red cross symbol is an icon of relief from disaster. For months, it has also been the subject of a festering disagreement between major American institutions: the health care company Johnson & Johnson and the American Red Cross.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Sues Red Cross Over Symbol
headline.print_headline: J.& J. Sues Red Cross Over Symbol
